DOC.brief_title: A Study Assessing Bryostatin Treatment Moderately Severe Severe Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll 150 moderately severe severe Alzheimer 's disease subject . Subjects randomly assign 1:1:1 treatment two different dos bryostatin 1 placebo . The primary analysis take place 12 week treatment ( 7 dos ) .
